Responsive web design is required to make the web page looke good and aligned in all the devices(mobile, laptop, tabs, etc). With the introduction of Grid layout in ZSUI, we also have responsive design for the grid layout.

Include CSS

Resize browser to see the impact

Portrait mode Grid

We do have classes for portrait mode and small, medium and large portrait mode as well.

Portrait mode implies that the height of screen is greater than its width.

Check the following grid in portrait mode. You can use development tool of browser to check the impact at different screen sizes keeping height greater than the width.

Portrait Mode -Div1 : Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cu mea quando dicant torquatos, te summo debitis elaboraret usu. Quis sanctus ut has. Eos autem maiorum at cum at omnes quando. Harum tritani gubergren his no, vim ne primis tamquam dolorem. Liber audire placerat ad ius.
